ygData.subject: Rise of the Silver Dragon
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson enters a deep sleep and is soon taken to a very deep level of his sub conscious, where he finds himself alone, first in Master Yokitron s training

Tucson enters a deep sleep and is soon taken to a very deep level of his su=
b conscious, where he finds himself alone, first in Master Yokitron's train=
ing quarters.  In this dream, his eyesight is returned and as sharp as it w=
as before his unfortunate mishap with Cyclonus.  Yet, he carries his body s=
ize of a Prime as indicated in a reflective panel inside the room.  As he t=
ouches the panel, it wisks him out of Yokitron's quarters and back in the w=
oods of the planet he is on now.  Odd enough, he finds himself inside a lar=
ge cave not far from the Ark. 

" I don't think I've ever seen this cave.  =
Odd, I know where I am and at the same time, I don't. "

A silver mist circ=
les his body and then vanishes inside a sub cavern as if telling Tucson to =
follow it.  He does just that and finds himself in a darker cave yet, as th=
e mist circles it creates just a hint of light and a hint of what resides i=
n the cave.  To his left ankle, a long, silver, tail with shimmering scales=
 moves ever so slightly, with a gentile nudge to Tucson's foot, urging him =
to come closser.

" Hello?  If I have done anything to disturb you, I apolo=
gize."

In response, a pair of Ice blue optics lights up the cave, as the f=
orm of a very old, majestic, dragon, peers straight into Tucson's optics.  =
The creature as silver as the warrior who is in his company.   Before he ca=
n say or do anything, Tucson wakes up abruptly with a sudden gasp, sitting =
up in his chamber.  Talon was still beside him, yet he did not want to wake=
 her.  He takes a few breaths and settles down to rest once again.  He thin=
ks to himself, trying to figure out what the dream meant and why did he hav=
e it?

" There has to be a meaning to what I just saw.  I wouldn't have dre=
mpt about Yokitron's quarters if it was just a dream.  Then the cave, and t=
hat silver dragon that was the same size as Hydras.   Why did I see him? "
=

He tries to move his damaged arm, and still the damage remains.  Being on =
a world primarily for the adaptation of organic life, there was a good chan=
ce that Tucson would have to give up his wheels for something more suitable=
 to the environment.  

" Wait a minute, Tucson, you can answer this yourse=
lf.  Two times you went against Hydras with little luck.  Why?  Because an =
Autobot shell can only do so much.  In order to defeat a creature of Hydras=
 power, you must BECOME a creature similar in strength.  Only then can you =
overcome your nemesis."

He closes his optics to resume his rest.

Outside =
the Ark, Straight Shot decides to venture out with Quickstride to scan the =
parameters for intruders to confirm a save construction site for the wind a=
nd water turbine.  Quickstride stops and points to where the wind turbine i=
s going to be.

" Right up there, that's where it's gonna go.  Nice locatio=
n, too.  Close to the Ark, tall enough to conceal the turbine. "

Straight =
Shot gives him a thumbs up.

" Looks good ta me."

Moments later, they reac=
h the mouth of the cave and begin to explore it.  

" Wow, Quickstride, thi=
s cave is enormous.  There's a sub chamber off to the right.  I wonder wher=
e it goes." 

Quickstride follows. 

" This is perfect.  So outa the way th=
at those Preds won't even know what's in here. "

He suddenly trips on some=
thing and looks down to find a long, silver, reptillian tail.  Then a low g=
rumble from inside startles them both.

Straight Shot looks to Quickstride.=


"Please tell me that was your stomach."

Quickstride shakes his head with=
 a terrified look on his face.

"Nope.  Wasn't me.  " 

He quickly gets int=
o beast mode as Straight Shot hops on his back. And as the occupant of the =
cave emerges, they are now greeted by a large draconic creature but waste n=
o time in fleeing the area.  Quickstride bolts back into the Ark with as mu=
ch terror as Straight Shot as they both scream;

"LEO, RODIMUS PRIME!"  

T=
ruly the duo had been severely spooked by the dragon's presence.
